phrases: Once upon a time, there was a knight.
The knight never faltered in his duty, no matter what it was.
He did not even falter in taking the life of his lover.
That was what he took pride in.
But the knight could not do anything but carry out his duty, and even after his death, he still seeks a duty to carry out.
They say the knight, who became a ghost and now haunts this world,
holds in his hand the blood-stained sword that pierced his lover's breast.
What was that?
The Wandering Knight
They say he appeared again!
The ghost knight!
Ahiru?
What is wrong?
You are all spaced out.
Oh, no, nothing's wrong.
Oh!
Come to think of it, today is...
Oh!
The day Fakir-sama comes back to school!
I wonder how wretched he will look when he comes!
Oh, so that is today.
So you are completely a Fakir-sama girl now too, huh?
What?!
No, I am telling you, Fakir and I are not like that!
But hey, if you are that serious about it, I have to support you, do not I?
Yeah, I will support you with all I have got too!
No, you see...
Okay, then!
First comes the love confession!
What is this?
They seem kind of freaky.
Yeah, we should not get involved with them.
You be careful too, Ahiru.
Ahiru?!
You are a duck!
What?!
I am a shrimp, by the way.
We are expressing our own inner worlds in concrete form.
And your image is that of a duck.
Right...
So, what division are you a student in?
The ballet division.
Oh, my!
Might she...
Why do not we ask her?
Okay, then.
Do you know Mytho-sama?
Yes...
You see, we are looking for a boy to dance ballet for us in our play.
I see...
We would really love to ask Mytho-sama to do it, but...
Mytho?
You will give me your beautiful heart, will not you?
No, as he is now, Mytho is...
Um, would it be okay if Fakir did it?
What?!
He is so scary.
He pushes people he does not like out the window, right?
That is not true!
And he is just as good at ballet as Mytho.
That is true.
With things as they are, Fakir-senpai would be okay too.
Really?!
This is a copy of the script.
Could you give it to Fakir-senpai for us?
Yes!
Thank you!
Hi.
I am glad you are back, Fakir.
I have been waiting for you.
Fakir!
Mytho-sama!
Why did you come back?
I protect Mytho.
That is all.
Protect?
How?
What can you do?
A knight who could not even die.
The knight's role in the story was to be torn in two and die,
but not only were you saved in that unseemly way,
you have got the nerve to STILL be alive.
In the story, you are no longer needed.
Now, you will just be forgotten.
I wonder what kind of play it is.
Oh, Fakir!
Morning!
What is with you, this early in the morning?
Hey, do you like plays, Fakir?
Ballet is dancing, but there is stories to it and stuff, you know?
So it is kind of like a play, I mean...
What are you trying to say?
See, the people from the Drama Club say they want you to dance the ballet in their play.
So read this script!
I mean, if you join clubs and stuff it will be easier for you to come to school, right?
I want you to stick close to Mytho as much as you can, so...
Fakir?
I do not need you to tell me to do that.
Okay!
I will leave it to you, then!
Hey, wait!
Fakir-san.
Cat-sensei?
You need not worry so much.
Bad blood between people has a way of eventually going away.
Oh, are you doing a club activity?
That is excellent.
Boys and girls working towards one goal, sweating youthful sweat together...
As you are doing that, a new meeting!
And eventually, love blooms!
And marriage...
Anyway, it is important to be involved in something in a positive manner.
Cat-sensei.
Yes?
Do you think it is possible to turn a love made impure back to normal?
That is a difficult issue.
What is an impure love?
What?
Who can say that Odile's love is impure?
What do you mean?
This is...
I wonder if Fakir read the script.
Oh, this must be it.
Hello!
Is anybody here?
Is Fakir he... I guess he would not be.
Hey.
Qua...
Fakir!
You came...
Where is the rest of this script?
Huh?
What do you mean the rest?
It ends in the middle.
It does?
What?
Huh?
You had not even read the script and you dumped it on me?
Oh, but everyone said the part was perfect for you and all!
So the ghost knight is perfect for me, eh?
The ghost knight?
What kind of story is it?
He was hailed as the strongest of knights and enemy nations all feared him.
The knight believed his duty was to risk his life to protect his king.
He even killed his own lover, who was a spy for an enemy kingdom, without faltering.
Eventually, the two nations made peace,
but the knight was exiled from his country in wretched fashion,
and from then on, knew not whom to protect or whom to defeat.
He died that way and his soul still continues to wander this world...
The script ends here.
That is kind of a sad story, is not it?
It is a funny story.
Rue-chan!
A knight who wanders around unable to do anything?
It certainly is perfect for you, Fakir.
Rue-chan!
Rue-chan...
Oh, it is Ahiru-san!
Oh, um, Fakir is...
My!
You really brought him along?
This is the original.
There is no record of when it was written or by whom.
I happened to find it while I was cleaning the room.
It was inside this bag.
It was afterwards that the strange rumors started going around.
Of the ghost knight.
It is impossible for a story to come true.
But it makes good advertising for our play, does not it?
So you are going to help us, then!
He is nicer than we thought!
Definitely going to be a success!
Break a leg, Fakir.
Fakir?
Why?
Why does this story bother me so much?
The dream I had, what the hell did it...
There was something strange about Fakir.
I wonder what was wrong?
Well, whatever!
He decided to do it!
So I can be glad, right?
But...
I wonder what I can do for Mytho?
Is searching for his heart shards really all I can do?
That is right, that is right!
You must not forget that.
So that you are not abandoned by the story...
So that you are not forgotten.
Would you like some water, Father?
Where is the heart?
Hurry up and give me a heart to eat!
I am sorry, Father!
I tried to capture a sacrifice in the prince's place, but...
YOU did?
Yes.
But...
What a useless thing to do.
You listen to me.
You will not be loved by anyone, but me and the prince in the story!
And there is NO way you will ever be loved so much that someone would give their own life for you.
Remember that well!
Yes.
If you were to get in the prince's way again, you would lose even my love!
I am sorry!
I will do things right this time!
The ghost knight and this book and the dream I had...
Just how are they...
Oh, there you are!
Fakir, everyone is assembled already!
Okay, I will be right there.
Why would I dream about the ghost knight?
Why?!
Did the ghost knight send me that dream?
The knight who is lost sight of his place to die, seeking something from me...
Does he want me to give him a place to die?
No, does it mean he will prepare a place for me to die?
It is almost scary somehow.
It is as if he really were the ghost knight.
I am going out shopping!
Say, I think I would probably be faster.
Want me to go?
Really?
Then please buy these.
Okay!
Okay, I did not forget anything, right?
But it kind of feels like the town's quieter than usual.
Is that because of the ghost knight rumors after all?
I would better hurry back!
That was marvelous.
This play will definitely be a success.
It was just like Ahiru-san said, was not it?
Where is Ahiru?
I had her go into town to do some shopping for me.
I see.
What do you think?
Would you do us the honor of formally joining our club?
I just remembered something I have to do.
Wait, Fakir-senpai!
You probably cannot hope for much from him after all.
Your hair is very lovely.
It is just like crow's feathers.
Thank you.
Well?
Have you decided on the next sacrifice?
It is those who possess young and beautiful hearts who are worthy of sacrifice.
I am just taking my time deciding.
I see.
Are you getting impatient?
Say, there've been some interesting rumors lately.
You mean the ghost knight?
You know everything, do not you?
Is that from getting your heart back too?
Princes need strong knights.
What if you got the famous ghost knight on your side?
That is a good idea.
After all, you cannot do anything, Kraehe.
Do not get angry.
It is the truth, is not it?
I know.
I will do as you say, Kraehe.
Why am I getting this bad feeling?
I wonder if this is that script's...
No, is this the ghost knight's fault?
This is kind of creepy...
Hey, did this town have a forest like this in it?
It is just a horse, right?
There is not really such a thing as the ghost knight, right?
It is coming this way?
NO!
Qua...
Is that the...
He was real!
Huh?
Does this mean the ghost knight just now had...
Huh?!
Again?!
Ahiru!
Are you there?
Oh, Fakir!
Just now, the ghost knight...
You saw him?
Yeah.
And he might have a shard of Mytho's heart!
What?
I see, so I still had a duty I could carry out as a knight.
Fakir, you do not mean to fight with that knight, do you?
Yes.
He is seeking the enemy he should fight.
But...
After I defeat him, you return the heart shard to Mytho.
Even if we end up dying on each other's swords, just leave me be.
Fakir!
Wait!
It looks like that horse already senses who should be its master.
That is right!
I can give you an enemy you should defeat.
Your sword is seeking blood, is not it?
Cut down that useless knight!
Mytho.
So it is just like the dream?
Now, if you are a true knight, do the job!
You are the one who showed me the end of the story, are not you?
Just as you wish, I will take this sword... and plunge it through your heart!
And then...
you can finally die!
No!
Stop!
You idiot, what are you doing?!
Do not fight, Fakir.
Wait, Tutu!
Damn it, where are you, Tutu?!
Tutu.
Dance with me.
Tutu!
What happened?!
Where are you?!
Stay away!
No matter how many times you swing your sword, your heart will not be satisfied.
I think you have already realized that.
Because that is not your real heart.
What do you want so badly that you took your lover's life?
You cannot stop fighting even after you have died, you are so sad, you suffer so much, you hold so much hate...
What do you want that much?
Is it really something more precious than a lover's life?
Stop fighting and give back Mytho's heart.
Stop this and give up your sword.
It is true that I am from an enemy kingdom.
But I am not saying this for my kingdom's sake.
I am saying it because I love you...
Because I do not want you to bear any more sorrow.
That is right.
Your battle is already over.
I am the feeling of pride.
The feeling of pride...
The shards of Mytho's heart that I gave back are making him suffer.
But this is the one thing I can do right now.
I have to get all of my feelings back as soon as I can, with help from Princess Tutu.
And then, I will go back into the story.
It makes sense that it is best for pieces of Mytho's heart to go back inside Mytho.
Right, Mytho?
Tutu...
Was the ghost knight able to die?
Ahiru!
Fakir, is it okay if I sleep a little?
Cannot my sword even protect her?
Now I am in a bind.
Something sinister is going on, but every single one of them is totally useless!
If only Edel were here at times like this...
Oh, what a bind!
I do not really want you brandishing a sword.
I mean...
So you do not acknowledge me as a knight?
You have raven's blood running through your veins, just like I do.
If I have you, I can become a prima ballerina, cannot I?
The feeling that is grown to the bursting point inside you, that is real love.
Shut up!
What is this real love?!
What you are seeking is false love.
If this love is false, then all the love in the world is false love!
A Midsummer Night's Dream
All you children who love stories, come gather around.
The voice calling, come now, wake up
Wiping a tearstained face
The brilliant light and the dew on trees are born
By the secret water's edge that no one knows of
Dance the pas de deux of life
Dreaming again today
It is a gentle, yet fierce current
How far does the labyrinth stretch?
I shall go
The dream I hold tight
I loved like I was dreaming
It swells...
My heart swells
I thought how wonderful it was to be alive
I cannot wait for tomorrow
I want to be there for you
At all times
Wait, it will not wait
Running, running along
Passing by even the wind and the rain clouds
Just beating my own wings
